gameDetails.name: Joyride: Unleashed
gameDetails.description:
Joyride: Unleashed introduces the dreaded Beetle-Gator, a mutant beast that wreaks havoc as it scurries across the track.


    Safari 4x4 is on the hunt - a car with incredible cornering flexibility but only at very low speeds.
    Balance the odds with Gum Traps that force your opponents to slow down too!
    Four mini-obstacles to help design your own tracks.


Every element is fully compatible with Joyride: Survival of the Fastest and Joyride Duel: Next Gen.
